block.p: Jennifer Jean Morris and Michael Adam Gollust were married last evening at Pochron Studios, a photography studio and loft space in Brooklyn. The Rev. Kim Kirkley, an interfaith minister, officiated.

The bride, 32, is the senior interior designer and a project manager for Zeff Design, an architecture and design firm in New York. She graduated from the University of Cincinnati. She is a daughter of Jessie Bohlke Morris and Wayne E. Morris of Catonsville, Md.
Jennifer Jean Morris and Michael Adam Gollust were married last evening at Pochron Studios, a photography studio and loft space in Brooklyn. The Rev. Kim Kirkley, an interfaith minister, officiated.
Jennifer Jean Morris and Michael Adam Gollust were married last evening at Pochron Studios, a photography studio and loft space in Brooklyn. The Rev. Kim Kirkley, an interfaith minister, officiated.

The bride, 32, is the senior interior designer and a project manager for Zeff Design, an architecture and design firm in New York. She graduated from the University of Cincinnati. She is a daughter of Jessie Bohlke Morris and Wayne E. Morris of Catonsville, Md.

The bridegroom, also 32, is the head of the fact-checking department at Men's Journal magazine in New York. He graduated magna cum laude from Brown. He is the son of Rochelle M. Gollust and David A. Gollust of Bethesda, Md.
